{"chunk": "Profit/loss on sale or retirement has been included in the
income statement under gross profit and other operating
expenses.

Impairment of intangible assets and property, plant and
equipment
The carrying amount of intangible assets and property
plant and equipment is reviewed annually for indication
of impairment for loss, apart from what is expressed by", "context": "This chunk is describing the accounting policies related to the recognition and measurement of the company's tangible and intangible assets, specifically around impairment of those assets."}
